title: iha para menumeru
sahitya:
ihapara menumeru vulagilum paraSugam udavum SuguNaseelaa

(ihapara)

 

anupallavi



guha saravaNabava sivabaalaa - siva -

guruvenum pugazhpeRum vaDivElaa

agamuRum avuNargaL gulakaalaa

amararulagam agilavuyirum vaLaravaruL krupaalavaala

(ihapara)

 

caraNam



dayainiRainda tiru vizhigaL paniraNDum

tavazhnda muRuval vadanam aaRum

puyaga raajanenat tigazhnda panniru

buyangaLum agala maNipaNiyum

*mayaloDum irupuRam irumaadar

maruva nan mayilmisai varuvaayE

bayaSija padaviNai taruvaayE

bavakaDaR karai kaDakka aruN marakkalaNG koDukkum

(ihapara)
